title: World Series: Yordan Alvarez’s Family Is Here From Cuba to Cheer for Astros
description: It took years for Alvarez’s parents to get to the United States from Cuba to see him star for the Houston Astros. They are soaking in every second.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:description: When Houston’s Yordan Alvarez doubled in a run in the first inning of Game 2 of the World Series on Saturday, no one in Minute Maid Park was happier than Alvarez’s father, Agustín.
